Package fr.insa.IA.Cartes

Class Deck

java.lang.Object
fr.insa.IA.Cartes.Deck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Deck extends Object implements Serializable
A Deck of our simplified Belote. At it uses a 8-cards deck : 2 colors, from Jack to As.
Author:
AUGEREAU Jeremy, GRAC Guilhem
